annotations.description: Most people equate Jägermeister with night clubs and shot machines and I think that's a bit unfair. In this episode I endeavor to show you guys some really a...
annotations.title: How To Use Jägermeister Like An Adult in 6 Cocktails

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Jagermeister
.75oz (22.5ml) Ginger Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
Top soda water Approx. 2oz (60ml) 

Shake and pour over ice in collins.
Garnish with ginger candy

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nfN_CAcySGo
title: Jager Buck
